src_original: na kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātūn kalpayati na vikalpayati /  na rāgadveṣamohān kalpayati na vikalpayati /
na satyaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /  na mṛṣā kalpayati na vikalpayati /
na saṃyogaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /  na visaṃyogaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /  na pratītyasamutpādaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
